alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:04AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lauderdale, southwestern Colbert and northwestern Franklin Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 703 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midway to near Burton to Baldwyn. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Red Bay, Cherokee, Malone, Posey Loop, Pogo, Mt Hester, Srygley Church, Maud, Allsboro and Barton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
